an5.200:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kamam manasikaroto kamesu cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati.
an5.200:1.4: Nekkhammam kho panassa manasikaroto nekkhamme cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati.
an5.200:1.5: Tassa tam cittam sugatam subhavitam suvutthitam suvimuttam suvisamyuttam kamehi;
an5.200:1.6: ye ca kamapaccaya uppajjanti asava vighataparilaha, mutto so tehi, na so tam vedanam vediyati.
an5.200:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno byapadam manasikaroto byapade cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati.
an5.200:2.2: Abyapadam kho panassa manasikaroto abyapade cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati.
an5.200:2.3: Tassa tam cittam sugatam subhavitam suvutthitam suvimuttam suvisamyuttam byapadena;
an5.200:2.4: ye ca byapadapaccaya uppajjanti asava vighataparilaha, mutto so tehi, na so tam vedanam vediyati.
an5.200:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vihesam manasikaroto vihesaya cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati.
an5.200:3.2: Avihesam kho panassa manasikaroto avihesaya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati.
an5.200:3.3: Tassa tam cittam sugatam subhavitam suvutthitam suvimuttam suvisamyuttam vihesaya;
an5.200:3.4: ye ca vihesapaccaya uppajjanti asava vighataparilaha, mutto so tehi, na so tam vedanam vediyati.
an5.200:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rupam manasikaroto rupe cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati.
an5.200:4.2: Arupam kho panassa manasikaroto arupe cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati.
an5.200:4.3: Tassa tam cittam sugatam subhavitam suvutthitam suvimuttam suvisamyuttam rupehi;
an5.200:4.4: ye ca rupapaccaya uppajjanti asava vighataparilaha, mutto so tehi, na so tam vedanam vediyati.
an5.200:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkayam manasikaroto sakkaye cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati.
an5.200:5.2: Sakkayanirodham kho panassa manasikaroto sakkayanirodhe cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati.
an5.200:5.3: Tassa tam cittam sugatam subhavitam suvutthitam suvimuttam suvisamyuttam sakkayena;
an5.200:5.4: ye ca sakkayapaccaya uppajjanti asava vighataparilaha, mutto so tehi, na so tam vedanam vediyati.
an5.200:6.1: Tassa kamanandipi nanuseti, byapadanandipi nanuseti, vihesanandipi nanuseti, rupanandipi nanuseti, sakkayanandipi nanuseti so kamanandiyapi ananusaya, byapadanandiyapi ananusaya, vihesanandiyapi ananusaya, rupanandiyapi ananusaya, sakkayanandiyapi ananusaya.
an5.200:6.2: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niranusayo, acchecchi tanham, vivattayi samyojanam, samma manabhisamaya antamakasi dukkhassa.
an5.200:6.3: Ima kho, bhikkhave, panca nissaraniya dhatuyo”ti.
